event.title: Microsoft Events Catalog
event.description: A fully-searchable catalog of events conducted by Microsoft and their partners.

event.title: Microsoft Ignite
event.description: Until our next event experience, check out the latest learning opportunities, recent event highlights, and more.

event.title: Azure Data Conference - Orlando
event.description:
Join your favorite Microsoft leaders and engineers as they share their excitement about the future of Microsoft technologies. Their keynotes set the stage for this great learning event.
The Microsoft engineers presenting will take a deep dive with you into the many new technology releases, including the latest updates to SQL Server, Azure SQL, and the entire Azure Data Platform.
Youâ€™ll also have the opportunity to spend time with Microsoft engineers and industry experts you know and trust to present real-world solutions and tips for productivity. Join other leaders from the Azure Data Community to connect, network and grow!

event.title: PSConfEU
event.description: Join us June 19th-22nd 2023 at Cubex Centrum, Prague, Czech Republic to discover what professionals around the globe are doing to solve real-world problems! Beyond PowerShell, today's engineers need to understand DevOps and increasingly evolve in the cloud. Meet the welcoming PowerShell community and talk as equals. At the PowerShell Conference Europe you can sit and talk with anyone - speakers, attendees, members of the product team. Share your code and show how you are solving problems so that others can learn from you and learn from those that have a different approach to the same problem.

event.title: SQL Saturday Ica 2023 (#1051)
event.description: Free one day conference for data professionals

event.title: SQLKonferenz
event.description: SQLKonferenz is the largest conference for the Microsoft Data Platform in the DACH region. It is a conference organized by the German Microsoft Data Platform Community (PASS Deutschland e.V.). The conference is established since 2014 and holds german and english speaking tracks. The conference venue is located this year in HANA, which is 40km from Frankfurt International Airport in the middle of Germany.

event.title: SQL Saturday Denver 2023 (#1056)
event.description: Free one day conference for data professionals

event.title: SQL Saturday Boston 2023
event.description:
SQL Saturday is a one-day free training event for people that work with the Microsoft Data Platform SQL Saturday Boston 2023 will take place on October 14th, 2023, at the Microsoft Burlington office. This is a free event for the tech community organized by SQLSatuday and New England SQL Server User Group (NESQL) We encourage you to register early.
Precon on October 13th, 2023: Mastering Query Tuning by Brent Ozar

event.title: Live! 360
event.description:
Live! 360 returns to Orlando, November 12-17, 2023 at the Loews Royal Pacific Resort, Orlando, FL. Live! 360 offers six co-located technical conferences for the Developer, Data, Security, and IT community at one time for one low price. Incorporating knowledge transfer, networking and leading-edge training, these conferences keep attendees up-to-date on current technologies with a look to the future.
Live! 360 is the perfect opportunity to get all the training you need with these co-located conferences: Visual Studio Live! SQL Server Live! TechMentor Artificial Intelligence Live! Cloud and Containers Live! Cybersecurity and Ransomware Live!

event.title: PostgreSQL Conference Europe
event.description:
PostgreSQL Conference Europe is by far the largest PostgreSQL conference in Europe.
Over a decade of PostgreSQL The conference is organised by PostgreSQL Europe, with participation from most of the PostgreSQL user groups around Europe, and is intended to be an important meeting and cooperation point for users both in and out of Europe.
PGConf.EU is a unique chance for European PostgreSQL users and developers to catch up, learn, build relationships, get to know each other and consolidate a real network of professionals that use and work with PostgreSQL.
